column5: A HAPPY MAN TODAY. BRUINS TAKE GAME ONE AND SAVARD SCORES THE WINNING GOAL.  Great entertaining game to watch.
It was a good one...my dad is a philly fan and I a Bruins...making for entertaining to watch us.
stupid time of day for a game...
come on boston only 3 more wins
Is hockey season still going on......  While not a Bruins fan I do like the Red Sox but so far they SUCK this year....HATE the YANKEES...
